text: Ryan George Henson Loft (born 14 September 1997) is an English professional footballer who plays as a striker for Scunthorpe United. ==Early and personal life== Born in Gravesend, Loft attended Northfleet Technology College, where he was a high jump champion. ==Career== After playing for Dartford and Ebbsfleet United, Loft joined Tottenham Hotspur for the 2013–14 season. He moved to Braintree Town in March 2016 on a 'work experience' deal, He signed on loan for Stevenage in January 2017, and for Exeter City in January 2018. He was released by Tottenham at the end of the 2017–18 season. In July 2018 Loft signed a two-year contract with Leicester City. He moved on loan to Carlisle United in August 2019. He was released by Leicester at the end of the 2019–20 season.
